summary.span: 定义并表示动态程序集。

span.span: Defines and represents a dynamic assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态程序集是使用反射发出 Api 创建的程序集。A dynamic assembly is an assembly that is created using the Reflection Emit APIs. 当使用 方法保存动态程序集时，将保存程序集中的动态模块。The dynamic modules in the assembly are saved when the dynamic assembly is saved using the method. 若要生成可执行文件，必须调用 方法来标识作为程序集入口点的方法。To generate an executable, the method must be called to identify the method that is the entry point to the assembly. 默认情况下，程序集保存为 Dll，除非 方法请求生成控制台应用程序或基于 Windows 的应用程序。Assemblies are saved as DLLs by default, unless the method requests the generation of a console application or a Windows-based application. 如果动态程序集包含多个动态模块，则程序集的清单文件名应匹配指定为 方法的第一个参数的模块名称。If a dynamic assembly contains more than one dynamic module, the assembly's manifest file name should match the module's name that is specified as the first argument to the method. 从 对象调用时，基本 类上的某些方法（如 `GetModules` 和 `GetLoadedModules`）将无法正常工作。Some methods on the base class, such as `GetModules` and `GetLoadedModules`, will not work correctly when called from objects. 可以加载已定义的动态程序集，并对已加载的程序集调用方法。You can load the defined dynamic assembly and call the methods on the loaded assembly. 例如，若要确保在返回的模块列表中包含资源模块，请对加载的 对象调用 `GetModules`。For example, to ensure that resource modules are included in the returned module list, call `GetModules` on the loaded object. 在将程序集保存到磁盘之前，使用 对动态程序集的签名无效。The signing of a dynamic assembly using is not effective until the assembly is saved to disk. 因此，强名称将无法用于暂时性动态程序集。So, strong names will not work with transient dynamic assemblies. 若要获取 对象，请使用 方法。To get an object, use the method. ## 反射发出动态程序集方案Reflection emit dynamic assembly scenarios 下面是使用 类创建动态程序集时要考虑的一些事项。The following are some things to consider when using the class to create dynamic assemblies. ### 动态模块Dynamic modules 反射发出支持创建动态程序集中定义的动态模块。Reflection emit supports the creation of dynamic modules defined in dynamic assemblies. 在动态程序集中创建的动态模块可以是暂时性的，也可以是持久的。A dynamic module created in a dynamic assembly can be transient or persistable. ### 对类型引用的限制Restrictions on type references 程序集可以引用在其他程序集中定义的类型。Assemblies can reference types defined in another assembly. 瞬态动态程序集可以安全引用在其他暂时性动态程序集、持久动态程序集或静态程序集中定义的类型。A transient dynamic assembly can safely reference types defined in another transient dynamic assembly, a persistable dynamic assembly, or a static assembly. 但是，公共语言运行时不允许可持续动态模块引用在暂时性动态模块中定义的类型。However, the common language runtime does not allow a persistable dynamic module to reference a type defined in a transient dynamic module. 这是因为在将持久化动态模块保存到磁盘后，如果将其加载，则运行时无法解析对在暂时性动态模块中定义的类型的引用。This is because when the persisted dynamic module is loaded after being saved to disk, the runtime cannot resolve the references to types defined in the transient dynamic module. ### 发出到远程应用程序域的限制Restrictions on emitting to remote application domains 某些方案要求在远程应用程序域中创建和执行动态程序集。Some scenarios require a dynamic assembly to be created and executed in a remote application domain. 反射发出不允许将动态程序集直接发送到远程应用程序域。Reflection emit does not allow a dynamic assembly to be emitted directly to a remote application domain. 解决方案是在当前应用程序域中发出动态程序集，将发出的动态程序集保存到磁盘，然后将动态程序集加载到远程应用程序域中。The solution is to emit the dynamic assembly in the current application domain, save the emitted dynamic assembly to disk, and then load the dynamic assembly into the remote application domain. ### 动态程序集访问模式Dynamic assembly access modes 可以使用以下访问模式之一创建动态程序集：Dynamic assemblies can be created using one of the following access modes: - 对象表示的动态程序集是暂时性的。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is transient. 动态程序集仅可用于执行发出的代码。The dynamic assembly can only be used to execute the emitted code. - 对象表示的动态程序集是可持久的，但在从磁盘加载已保存的可移植可执行文件（PE）文件之前，不能执行该程序集。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is persistable but cannot be executed until the saved portable executable (PE) file has been loaded from disk. - 对象表示的动态程序集是可持久的，但也可以在程序集保存到磁盘之前和/或之后执行。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is persistable, but can also be executed before and/or after the assembly is saved to disk. 必须通过在定义动态程序集时在 方法的调用中提供适当的 值来指定访问模式，并且以后无法更改。The access mode must be specified by providing the appropriate value in the call to the method when the dynamic assembly is defined and cannot be changed later. 运行时使用动态程序集的访问模式来优化程序集的内部表示形式。The runtime uses the access mode of a dynamic assembly to optimize the assembly's internal representation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用一个模块定义动态程序集。The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module. 示例程序集中的模块包含一种类型，`MyDynamicType`，其中包含一个私有字段、一个用于获取和设置私有字段的属性、用于初始化私有字段的构造函数，以及一个方法，该方法将用户提供的数字与私有字段值相乘并返回结果。The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result. 创建程序集时指定 。 is specified when the assembly is created. 系统将立即使用程序集代码，并将程序集保存到磁盘，以便可以使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或在其他程序中使用它来检查程序集代码。The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program. [!code-cpp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cpp/24895.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cs/24895.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/vb/24895.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fileName` 不应与任何其他持久模块、独立托管资源或独立清单文件中的相同。`fileName` should not be the same as that of any other persistable module, standalone managed resource, or the standalone manifest file. 文件中的托管资源被假定为公共。The managed resources in the file are assumed to be public. 指定的资源文件必须在将保存程序集的目录中。The specified resource file must be in the directory where the assembly will be saved. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `AddResourceFile`将资源文件附加到动态创建的程序集。The following code sample demonstrates how to attach a resource file to a dynamically created assembly, using `AddResourceFile`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在一个程序集中定义具有相同名称的多个动态模块是错误的。It is an error to define multiple dynamic modules with the same name in an assembly. 定义的动态模块是暂时性的。The defined dynamic module is transient. 即使父动态程序集是用 创建的，也不会保存动态模块。The dynamic module is not saved, even if the parent dynamic assembly was created with . > [!NOTE] > 若要在调试动态模块时取消优化，请在调用 之前将 特性应用于动态程序集。To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling . 使用 标志创建 的实例，并使用 方法应用它。Create an instance of with the flag and apply it using the method. 特性必须应用于动态程序集。The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果应用于模块，则它不起作用。It has no effect if applied to the module. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples [Visual Basic， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `DefineDynamicModule`创建暂时性的动态模块。The code example below demonstrates how to create a transient dynamic module using `DefineDynamicModule`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在一个程序集中定义具有相同名称的多个动态模块是错误的。It is an error to define multiple dynamic modules with the same name in an assembly. 即使父动态程序集是用 创建的，也不会保存动态模块。The dynamic module is not saved, even if the parent dynamic assembly was created with . > [!NOTE] > 若要在调试动态模块时取消优化，请在调用 之前将 特性应用于动态程序集。To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling . 使用 标志创建 的实例，并使用 方法应用它。Create an instance of with the flag and apply it using the method. 特性必须应用于动态程序集。The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果应用于模块，则它不起作用。It has no effect if applied to the module. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集只能与一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，在之前调用一种方法 或 后，将引发 ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException being throw. 需要将多个非托管资源与 Microsoft ResMerge 实用工具（不随公共语言运行时提供）等工具合并。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft ResMerge utility (not supplied with the common language runtime). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 `DefineUnmanagedResource`创建表示非托管资源的字节数组，并将其附加到动态程序集。The following code sample creates and attaches an array of bytes representing an unmanaged resource to a dynamic assembly, using `DefineUnmanagedResource`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集只能与一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，在之前调用一种方法 或 后，将引发 ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException. 需要将多个非托管资源与 Microsoft ResMerge 实用工具（不随公共语言运行时提供）等工具合并。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft ResMerge utility (not supplied with the common language runtime). > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示对 `DefineUnmanagedResource`的调用，传递外部资源文件。The example below demonstrates a call to `DefineUnmanagedResource`, passing an external resource file. span.span: Defines an unmanaged version information resource using the information specified in the assembly's AssemblyName object and the assembly's custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集只能与一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，在之前调用一种方法 或 后，将引发 ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException. 需要将多个非托管资源与工具（如 Microsoft ResMerge 实用工具，而不是与公共语言运行时 SDK 一起提供）合并在一起。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft ResMerge utility (not supplied with the common language runtime SDK). 空参数字符串作为单个空格写入。Empty argument strings get written as a single space. 空格替换参数字符串中的 null 字符。Spaces are substituted for null characters in the argument strings. 此信息是从用于定义此动态程序集的 `AssemblyName` 对象中推断出来的。The information is inferred from the `AssemblyName` object used to define this dynamic assembly. 此程序集的自定义属性将覆盖 `AssemblyName` 对象中指定的信息。This assembly's custom attributes override information specified in the `AssemblyName` object. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `DefineVersionInfoResource`的用法。The example below illustrates the usage of `DefineVersionInfoResource`. [!code-cpp[AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource/CPP/assemblybuilder_defineversioninforesource.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource/CS/assemblybuilder_defineversioninforesource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilder_DefineVersionInfoResource/VB/assemblybuilder_defineversioninforesource.vb#1)]

span.span: Defines an unmanaged version information resource for this assembly with the given specifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集只能与一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，在之前调用一种方法 或 后，将引发 ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException. 需要将多个非托管资源与 Microsoft `ResMerge` 实用程序（不随公共语言运行时 SDK 提供）的工具合并。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft `ResMerge` utility (not supplied with the common language runtime SDK). 空参数字符串作为单个空格写入。Empty argument strings get written as a single space. 空格替换参数字符串中的 null 字符。Spaces are substituted for null characters in the argument strings. 版本资源的结构包括标识文件的版本、语言和分发的数据。The structure of the version resource includes data that identifies the version, language, and distribution of the file. 安装程序使用文件安装库（VER。DLL）来检索文件中的版本信息资源，并从资源提取版本信息块。Installation programs use the functions in the file installation library (VER.DLL) to retrieve the version information resource from a file and to extract the version information blocks from the resource. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `DefineVersionInfoResource`的用法。The example below illustrates the usage of `DefineVersionInfoResource`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法保存在此动态程序集中定义的所有非瞬态动态模块。This method saves all non-transient dynamic modules defined in this dynamic assembly. 不保存暂时性的动态模块。Transient dynamic modules are not saved. 程序集文件名可以与其中一个模块的名称相同。The assembly file name can be the same as the name of one of the modules. 如果是这样，程序集清单将存储在该模块中。If so, the assembly manifest is stored within that module. `assemblyFileName` 可以与程序集内包含的所有模块的名称不同。`assemblyFileName` can be different from the names of all of the modules contained within the assembly. 如果是这样，则程序集文件仅包含程序集清单。If so, the assembly file contains only the assembly manifest. 对于使用 获取的每个 ，此方法会写入 .resources 文件并调用 关闭流。For each obtained using , this method writes the .resources file and calls to close the stream. `assemblyFileName` 需要是无驱动器或目录组件的简单文件名。The `assemblyFileName` needs to be a simple file name without a drive or directory component. 若要在特定目录中创建程序集，请使用采用目标目录参数的 方法之一。To create an assembly in a specific directory, use one of the methods that takes a target directory argument. 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中， 方法的此重载等效于调用 方法重载，并将 `portableExecutableKind` 参数的 和 参数 `imageFileMachine`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this overload of the method is equivalent to calling the method overload with for the `portableExecutableKind` parameter and for the `imageFileMachine` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个动态程序集，然后使用 `Save`将其保存到本地磁盘。The following code sample creates a dynamic assembly and then persists it to a local disk using `Save`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `imageFileMachine` 和 `portableExecutableKind` 不兼容，`imageFileMachine` 优先于 `portableExecutableKind`。If `imageFileMachine` and `portableExecutableKind` are incompatible, `imageFileMachine` takes precedence over `portableExecutableKind`. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 例如，如果您指定与 ，则将忽略 。For example, if you specify with , is ignored. 此方法保存在此动态程序集中定义的所有非瞬态动态模块。This method saves all non-transient dynamic modules defined in this dynamic assembly. 不保存暂时性的动态模块。Transient dynamic modules are not saved. 程序集文件名可以与模块之一的名称相同。The assembly file name can be the same as the name of one of the module. 如果是这样，程序集清单将存储在该模块中。If so, the assembly manifest is stored within that module. `assemblyFileName` 可以与程序集内包含的所有模块的名称不同。`assemblyFileName` can be different from the names of all of the modules contained within the assembly. 如果是这样，则程序集文件仅包含程序集清单。If so, the assembly file contains only the assembly manifest. 对于使用 获取的每个 ，此方法会写入 .resources 文件并调用 关闭流。For each obtained using , this method writes the .resources file and calls to close the stream. `assemblyFileName` 需要是无驱动器或目录组件的简单文件名。The `assemblyFileName` needs to be a simple file name without a drive or directory component. 若要在特定目录中创建程序集，请使用采用目标目录参数的 方法之一。To create an assembly in a specific directory, use one of the methods that takes a target directory argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何 `binaryAttribute`格式的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA Partition II 文档中的元数据规范。See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. `RuntimeConstructorInfo` 是由系统生成的特殊类型。`RuntimeConstructorInfo` is a special type generated by the system. 它派生自 类，并且通过反射获取的任何 对象实际上都是 `RuntimeConstructorInfo`的实例。It derives from the class, and any object you obtain through reflection is actually an instance of `RuntimeConstructorInfo`. > [!NOTE] > 不能用于设置声明性安全特性。 cannot be used to set declarative security attributes. 使用 的重载之一，该重载采用必需的、可选的和拒绝的权限。Use one of the overloads of that takes required, optional, and refused permissions. > [!NOTE] > 从 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]开始，此成员不再需要带有 标志的 。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. （请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。）若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `SetCustomAttribute` 将自定义属性附加到动态生成的程序集。The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` to attach a custom attribute to a dynamically generated assembly.
